CONJUGATES: tenth (adj., n.) | one tenth (fraction) | tenthly (adv.) | ten (cardinal)
ETYMOLOGY: From Middle English tenthe, from Old English tēotha (earlier tīenþa), equivalent to ten + -th (ordinal suffix).

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Coming after the ninth in order or rank; 10th.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 按顺序排列在第九个之后的；第十的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: It was the tenth time they had played that song.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 那是他们第十次演奏那首歌了。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The person, thing, or position that is tenth in a sequence.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 序列中的第十个事物、人或位置。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She was the tenth to cross the finish line.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她是第十个冲过终点线的人。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: One of ten equal parts into which something is divided; the fraction 1/10.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 十分之一；某物被分成十等份中的一份。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: They decided to donate a tenth of their annual income to charity.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他们决定将年收入的十分之一捐给慈善机构。
